page.title: 18HEALTH STRACATHRO
page.content:
Mr Pirnie, the Hospital Administrator, came to school to tell us about the exciting things going on in his hospital.The bit I was interested in was the sewage works.I could hardly believe what happened there.The dirty water goes down the systems and into the sewage pipe.All the dirt is dried and so is the paper after they have been skimmed off.This is taken to the furnace where the dried sludge is burned. Now you are wondering where the water goes.It goes down to a gravelly bit where millions of insects eat the dirt left in the water.When the water gets higher,it goes over and there is a man with a tumbler who tastes the water to see if it is good enough.
Hugh King wrote this.
